title: stuck in 30 fps
body: hey beautiful people today I played a game and my fps were 150 all very high after the installing the 6.18 patch i cannot get pass 30 fps and i have my driver woth the latest version I already clicked on the option repair and nothing work. I ll be pleased if someone could help me thx for readig and sorry for english

replies.body: FPS problems can usually be caused by driver or hardware issues, but it can also be caused by bad game files too.  I know that you've done some troubleshooting already, but it's really important that you go through every step in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, which can help resolve this for good.  Let me me know if you have any questions, beautiful!
